benchmark_details.name: CoMM (Coherent interleaved image-text MultiModal dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: CoMM is a high-quality coherent interleaved image-text dataset designed to enhance the coherence, consistency, and alignment of generated multimodal content.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a high-quality dataset for training and evaluating multimodal language models on interleaved image-text generation tasks.

data.source: Various sources of instructional content and visual storytelling including WikiHow and eHow.
data.annotation: Filtered and refined using advanced models for coherence and relevance.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on evaluations conducted by LLMs such as GPT-4o and Llama3.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better coherence, completeness, and alignment in interleaved image-text sequences.
methodology.validation: Dataset validated against previous datasets like MMC4 and OBELICS.
